arts.ttl: Thomas Tuchel hails ‘teamwork in its purest form’ as England hammer Serbia
arts.sum: Harry Kane, Noni Madueke, Ezri Konsa, Marc Guehi and Marcus Rashford all scored in a 5-0 win in Belgrade.

arts.ttl: England stars react after triple milestone hit in Serbia thrashing
arts.sum: A trio of the Three Lions’ five goals in Belgrade rout were particularly special - and all for the same reason

arts.ttl: Thomas Tuchel sends England stars clear new message after Serbia demolition
arts.sum: German’s underwhelming tenure kick-started by five-goal thrashing in Belgrade

arts.ttl: England beats Serbia 5-0 for a statement win under Tuchel. France and Portugal dodge upsets
arts.sum: Three of Europe’s soccer powerhouses took big steps closer to the 2026 World Cup on Tuesday, all while Erling Haaland scored five goals in an 11-1 win with fresh stitches in his face . Noni Madueke, Ezri Konsa and Marc Guehi all scored their first goals for England, which beat Serbia 5-0 for a win which could be a turning point in Tuchel’s tenure.

arts.ttl: England vs Serbia match paused after laser pen shone in Ezri Konsa’s face
arts.sum: England’s World Cup qualifying match against Serbia was briefly paused on Tuesday night, after a laser pen was pointed at Ezri Konsa’s face.

arts.ttl: England finally deliver on Thomas Tuchel’s vision with five-goal rout of Serbia
arts.sum: Serbia 0-5 England: The Three Lions delivered a complete performance that provided excitement for their prospects at the World Cup

arts.ttl: Ref paused Serbia v England after laser incident
arts.sum: England's World Cup qualifier against Serbia in Belgrade is briefly paused by the referee when a laser pen is shone from the crowd in Ezri Konsa's face.

arts.ttl: Thomas Tuchel’s England era comes alive with five-star display in Serbia
arts.sum: England replied to their biggest test of the German’s reign with their best performance.

arts.ttl: Thomas Tuchel's England FINALLY arrive as Serbia thrashing has fans dreaming again
arts.sum: England put on the style in Belgrade to thrash Serbia 5-0 and effectively book their place at next summer's World Cup, with Thomas Tuchel enjoying his best night as Three Lions boss

arts.ttl: England player ratings vs Serbia: Marvellous Noni Madueke leads five-star rout
arts.sum: Elliot Anderson impresses again and Morgan Rogers takes his chance on night to remember in Belgrade
